item.description:
An all Ladies PRIDE Party on Saturday at Maddy’s Loungen in Saugus, MA.

Once your done with the parade and the block party, get closer to home and continue the celebration of PRIDE. Starting at 6:00 PM we will have Kowloons Chinese food at Maddy's
set up as a buffet for your pleasure.

Dance to the sounds of D.J. Tracy to her R&B, Latin and Hip Hop music in one room or go into our other room where you can continue to dance to the 70's, 80's and top 40 music by D.J. Murphy till 1:00 AM.

Buffet is $12.00 (includes cover charge)

Cover charge is $7.00

Make sure you get there early as you know the parking lot gets full very quickly.

• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Fully stocked Bar
• KENO
• $7.00 cover charge
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)
item.name: PRIDE Party @ MADDY'S
